graph_title: Average water consumption (m3) per person from the university community per year

SDG_GOAL: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all
SDG_TARGET: By 2030, substantially increase water-use efficiency across all sectors and ensure sustainable withdrawals and supply of freshwater to address water scarcity and substantially reduce the number of people suffering from water scarcity

indicator_level: Result (offer information on compliance with the SDG objectives at the UPO level)
